name: Doodle Spaceship
description:
Introduce

Control a spaceship on paper. Enemy comes upstage every 10 seconds. Dodge bullets and let them eat their own bitter fruit.

Control
  • Spaceship will try to follow your cursor. Left click to use skill. 
  • Bullet will hurt you and your enemy.
  • Defeat enemy to gain parts to buy new ship and skill. Use skill will also cost parts.
  • 1000 parts were given to you to let you enjoy.
